review: This story is hardcore propaganda and , judging by its score on IMDb , has succeeded in fooling a great number of people .

review: What is interesting to me is that the Left - wing"s brainwashing started this early .

review: Hollywood is still churning out the same bias today ( go and read my Dark Knight review ) .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The movie has a very interesting premise : An open - and - shut case is called in to question when one man on the twelve - man jury slowly convinces the others that the eighteen year old on trial for the murder of his father may , in fact , be innocent .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: That"s got some real potential , hasn"t it ? Sadly , the gone - in - the - head Leftist who wrote this did what I feared he would : loaded the dice

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and peddled a Leftist agenda - namely one that excuses criminals of their actions and seeks to end the death penalty .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: That"s the film"s overwhelming goal .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: It wants the audience to come away from the movie , not with a greater appreciation of the legal system , but with the view that the death penalty should be abolished and that anyone who objects to this is a deluded , little bigot .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: Let"s look at the facts we are given:-Spoilers from here on- 1 .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: An 18 year old is on trial for the murder of his father . He has no alibi .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The alibi he gave to police ( that he was in a theatre the whole time ) fell apart when he could not recall anything about the movies that were showing - even their names . 2 .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: There are two main witnesses : One saw the defendant leaving the scene of the crime (

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and heard the event ) ; the other saw the murder take place through a window

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and identified the defendant .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The defendant was also heard shouting in anger " I"m gon na kill you " , the same day as the murder . 3 .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The knife ( with a very rare design ) used in the murder is the same knife that the defendant had bought earlier and was carrying around .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: His friends testified to this effect . 4 .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The defendant is an habitual criminal who has had numerous run - ins with the law , including two arrests for knife fighting .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: He is said to be " real handy with a knife " . 5 .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The defendant has a clear motive : His father was repeatedly violent and abusive towards him ,

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and had beaten him regularly ( with fists ) since he was five years of age , including the day of the murder . I was intrigued .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: Why does this one juror believe the defendant may not be guilty ? How could he convince the rest that there is reasonable doubt ? Despite the fact I feared these questions would receive fob - offs , I was still hopeful an intelligent investigation would be crafted around them . But no .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: Straight away , the film deliberately loads the dice by having certain jurors holding prejudiced or otherwise undesirable traits , while the dissenting voice is calm , collected , and supremely open - minded .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: That"s cliché , and a very common Leftist tactic ( you"ll see it a lot on shows like Star Trek ) .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The film takes each of the facts above

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and finds an absurd alternate explanation for them , such as the knife could have fallen out of the defendants pocket

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and the true murderer used an identical knife ( this is the fantastic explanation given by our Leftist hero ) .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The film has a moronic moment where the " hero " pulls out a knife he has bought ( illegally ) , which appears identical to the one in question .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: The idea being that it isn"t so rare , after all .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: Other silly moments include the jury discussing why the defendant would come home a few hours later if he had indeed done the crime .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: Not one of them mentions that the defendant lives there

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: and would have to come back home in order to allay fears that he was the murderer .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: It"s part of an alibi .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: What else is he going to do , disappear and hope that the police don"t find that a tad suspicious ? Nearly every explanation given in favour of the defendant is absurd or complete conjecture .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: When you string all the known facts together , the chances of them all being explained away in a fashion that exonerates the defendant is literally millions to one .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: It"s so implausible that no sane jury would acquit .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: But the writer wants this to happen , so it does ( and 12 - 0 in favour , just in case you missed the point ) .

review: I love it when writers do that .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
review: " Okay , then , let"s just forget putting people on trial because we can hardly ever be 100 % sure that they did the crime in question , can we ? The number of victims created by having no deterrent , or by allowing dangerous criminals to go free , is FAR GREATER than the absolute minority case where an innocent person is found guilty .

title: Good Movie Ruined By Left Wing Bias and Smugness
